root.name: Kyuuyaku Megami Tensei
root.description: OverviewKyuuyaku Megami Tensei (Megami Tensei: The Old Testament) was released by Atlus for the Super Famicom in 1995 following the success of the Shin Megami Tensei games. Kyuuyaku contains remakes of the first two Megami Tensei games, featuring significant graphical improvements over their Famicom originals. Other additions include:2 entirely original introductory scenes.Save functionality, rather then the cumbersome password system of the original games.A new arranged soundtrack handled by renowned composer Hitoshi Sakimoto.
